===Etymology===
Various etymologies have been proposed:
* From a hypothetical common Sino-Tibetan *''la'' (“area far from settlements; wilderness”): compare {{cog|bo|ལ||mountain pass; hillside; mountain slope}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}});
* Related to {{cog|mkh-pro|*laʔ||to spread, extend}}: compare {{cog|km|លា||to unfold, spread, open out}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}});
* From a Sino-Tibetan root meaning “hut; pantry”: compare {{cog|bo|ལྷས||pen; fold; cattle enclosure}} ({{zh-ref|Starostin}}).
